sentences.en: ‘One word to him and I'll have you.’ ‘You and whose army?’.
sentences.cn: “你只要向他透露一个字，我就揍你。”“你行吗？”。

sentences.en: an army officer
sentences.cn: 陆军军官

sentences.en: Army units launched attacks on bases near Jounieh port.
sentences.cn: 陆军部队对朱尼耶港附近的基地发动了进攻。

sentences.en: Eventually, the army caught up with him in Latvia.
sentences.cn: 最终，大部队在拉脱维亚赶上了他。

sentences.en: He announced that the army and police had been confined to barracks.
sentences.cn: 他通告说军队和警察已经被禁闭在营房中不得外出。

sentences.en: He joined the army when he was 17.
sentences.cn: 他17岁参加了陆军。

sentences.en: His inspiration to fly came even before he joined the Army.
sentences.cn: 他想开飞机的念头在参军之前就有了。

sentences.en: If no agreement was reached, the army would step in.
sentences.cn: 如果无法达成协议，军队将会介入。

sentences.en: In June 1942, the British 8th Army was in full retreat.
sentences.cn: 1942年6月,英国第八军全面撤退.

sentences.en: Men in green army uniforms are sprinkled throughout the huge auditorium.
sentences.cn: 穿着绿色军服的人星星点点地分布在整个大礼堂中。

sentences.en: Mobutu ascended through the ranks, eventually becoming commander of the army.
sentences.cn: 蒙博托出身行伍，通过一级级晋升，最终成为了陆军司令。

sentences.en: More vigorous action is needed to force the federal army to disengage.
sentences.cn: 需要更强有力的行动来迫使联邦军队撤军。

sentences.en: The army are helping to clear up after the floods.
sentences.cn: 陆军部队正协助洪灾后的清理工作。

sentences.en: The army claims the rebels are on the ropes.
sentences.cn: 军队声称叛军支撑不了多久了。

sentences.en: The army is still one of the last male bastions.
sentences.cn: 军队仍然是男人占据的最后堡垒之一。

sentences.en: The army must be seen to be taking firm action.
sentences.cn: 军队必须采取坚决行动。

sentences.en: The army now appears to have launched a counter-offensive.
sentences.cn: 军队现在似乎已经发起了反攻。

sentences.en: The army refused to accept orders from the political leadership.
sentences.cn: 军队拒绝接受政界领导层下达的命令。

sentences.en: The pull-out of the army paves the way for independence.
sentences.cn: 军队的撤出为独立铺平了道路。

sentences.en: The technical aspects were the concern of the Army.
sentences.cn: 技术方面由陆军负责。

sentences.en: The village hall is maintained by an army of volunteers .
sentences.cn: 村礼堂由一大批志愿者维护。

phrases.phrase: an army marches on its stomach

phrases.tran_cn: 中国人民解放军建军节
(非正式)[用于表示怀疑对方进行威胁的能力]你行吗？你干得了吗？

trans.tran_en: the part of a country’s military force that is trained to fight on land in a war
